thread.title: Business diary: check out events happening for companies around the North East

author: Graeme Whitfield
title: Business diary: check out events happening for companies around the North East

organizations.name: north east england chamber of commerce team valley

text:
Get business   
February 20: North East England Chamber of Commerce GDPR summit: 100 days to go; Ramside Hall, Durham; 8.30am-11.30am (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) . 
February 2: Tyneside and Northumberland Business Awards; Marriott Hotel, Gosforth; 7pm (www.nebusinessawards.co.uk) 
February 26: EEF Manufacturing Connect - Future Factories: 4IR, an opportunity for everyone; Northern Design Centre Gateshead; 1pm-4pm (www.eef.org.uk) 
February 28: North East England Chamber of Commerce Seaton Delaval networking event; The Hastings, Seaton Delaval; 10am-12 noon (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) . 
March 1: Journal transport breakfast; Crowne Plaza, Newcastle; 7.30am (www.chroniclelive.co.uk) 
March 2: Community Foundation Women In Philanthropy conference; Crowne Plaza, Newcastle; 11.45am-2.30pm (http://www.communityfoundation.org.uk) 
March 3: TUC equalities conference; Gateshead Civic Centre; 10am-4pm (www.tuc.org.uk/northern) 
March 6: North East England Chamber of Commerce Team Valley networking event; Area North, Team Valley; 8.30-10.30 (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) . 
March 6: North East England Chamber of Commerce Durham Chamber Annual Review and AGM; Beamish Hall Country House Hotel; 11.15am-2pm (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) . 
March 8: Durham, Sunderland and South Tyneside Business Awards; Ramside Hall, Durham; 7pm (www.nebusinessawards.co.uk) 
March 13: North East England Chamber of Commerce Tyne and Wear Chamber Annual Review and AGM; Sunderland Marriott Hotel; 11.15am-2pm (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) 
March 20: North East England Chamber of Commerce Northumberland Chamber Annual Review and AGM; Matfen Hall Hotel; 11.15am-2pm (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) 
March 22: Teesside Business Awards; Olympia Building, Teesside University; 7pm (www.nebusinessawards.co.uk) 
March 29: North East England Chamber of Commerce Brexit summit; Crowne Plaza, Newcastle; 8.15-11.30 (www.neechamber.co.uk/events) . 
April 26: North East Business Awards regional final; Hardwick Hall, Sedgefield; 7pm (www.nebusinessawards.co.uk) 
* To publicise business events happening in the North East, email . Like us on Facebook
